tool_description: The API to search properties for sale or rent in USA
name: Real Estate USA
title: Real Estate USA

api_list.name: get property by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-estate-usa.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/properties/1088950142"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-estate-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-estate-usa.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/properties/{property_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-estate-usa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
